summary: An email chain between FBI personnel in New York discussing an introduction to a source (a classmate of the sender) who claims to have received real information on notable targets/victims in the Epstein case. The email facilitates contact between the source and the case investigators.
keyFacts: An FBI agent's classmate claims to have received real information on notable targets/victims in the Epstein case.
The email, dated August 25, 2021, shows FBI personnel facilitating an introduction to this potential source.
The correspondence indicates the Epstein case was still an active topic of information sharing within law enforcement in 2021.
The source of the information is described as 'very easy to deal with' compared to the email sender.
